SEARCH
Package org.example.oopproject1.service

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
org.example.oopproject1.service.UserService
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
@Service public class UserService extends Object implements org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
Service for managing user accounts and authentication.

Implements UserDetailsService for Spring Security, and provides methods to register users, update profile/status, retrieve lists and stats, and delete users.

Since:
1.0

  • Constructor Details

    • UserService

      @Autowired public UserService(UserRepository userRepository, org.springframework.security.crypto.password.PasswordEncoder passwordEncoder, JobRepository jobRepository, ApplicationRepository applicationRepository, RecruiterRepository recruiterRepository)
      Constructs the UserService with all required repositories and encoder.
      Parameters:
      userRepository - the UserRepository for CRUD on users
      passwordEncoder - the PasswordEncoder bean to hash passwords
      jobRepository - the JobRepository for reading job counts
      applicationRepository - the ApplicationRepository for reading application counts
      recruiterRepository - the RecruiterRepository for reading recruiter counts

      public org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails loadUserByUsername(String username) throws org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UsernameNotFoundException
      Specified by:
      loadUserByUsername in interface org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
      Parameters:
      username - the username to look up
      Returns:
      the UserDetails for Spring Security
      Throws:
      org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UsernameNotFoundException - if no user exists with that username

      public User updateUserProfile(User user, String newUsername, String newEmail)
      Update username and email for an existing user.
      Parameters:
      user - the user entity to modify
      newUsername - new username (unchanged if same)
      newEmail - new email (unchanged if same)
      Returns:
      the saved User

    • registerUser

      public User registerUser(String username, String email, String password, String role)
      Register a brand-new user account.
      Parameters:
      username - desired unique username
      email - desired unique email
      password - raw password (will be hashed)
      role - initial role (e.g. "USER")
      Returns:
      the created User
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if username or email already exists

    • updateUserStatus

      public User updateUserStatus(String id, boolean enabled)
      Enable or disable a user account.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user to toggle
      enabled - true = enable, false = disable
      Returns:
      the updated User
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the user does not exist

    • getDashboardStats

      public Map<String,Object> getDashboardStats()
      Gather high-level system stats for the admin dashboard.
      Returns:
      map with keys "totalUsers", "totalJobs", "totalApplications", "totalRecruiters"

      newEmail - new email (optional)
      newPassword - new raw password (optional)

      the updated User
